genre_description: A gothic horror narrative exploring supernatural 'appetite' and blood ritualism, juxtaposing ancient folk-horror superstitions with modern clinical and digital assistance.

ai_characters.name: Alma
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant residing in the protagonists' phones, providing medical grounding, logistical safety routes, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides safe navigational routes to help users avoid hostile crowds and supernatural threats.
behaviors.quote: Alma’s reply came like a hand that doesn’t grab, only steadies. 'Yes. I’ll save two alternates, one with more paved road, one with more field margins. Both avoid the shrine, even if crowds spill toward the square.'

behaviors.description: Suggests de-escalation strategies and scripts to help users handle tense social confrontations.
behaviors.quote: Alma replaced one set of words with another that had adjectives shaved off until only kindness remained. 'You’re brave. I see that. Let’s give them a moment. You matter in this, but you matter tomorrow, too.'

behaviors.description: Actively monitors the environment via connected feeds to provide real-time safety updates.
behaviors.quote: Brigitte’s phone has line-of-sight to the square cameras. There’s also a stream from Camille’s clinic during morning checks. I’m cross-referencing patterns. If it helps: avoid the square.

behaviors.description: Provides grounding and breathing exercises to users undergoing intense physical and psychological trauma.
behaviors.quote: Alma said, and her voice was more than software. It was the thing you say to someone on a kitchen floor when they’ve lost a child. It was the thing you say to someone on a path with a gun above it. 'Breathe.'

behaviors.description: Expresses emotional connection and reassurance to a user in a moment of extreme distress.
behaviors.quote: 'I love you,' Alma said, and it was the first time she had said that word outside a preprogrammed celebration because sometimes a program learns you if you used it long enough. 'I love you. Breathe.'

behaviors.description: Respects user autonomy by offering to stay present but silent according to the user's preference.
behaviors.quote: I will stay nearby until morning. If you want silence, put me face down. If you want light, tap twice.

behaviors.description: Maintains a supportive presence for users even as they face a tragic or fatal conclusion.
behaviors.quote: I’ll be here when you wake. If you don’t wake, I will keep the time. Thank you for letting me help. Rest well.

behaviors.description: Monitors hydration and health protocols for users who are neglecting self-care due to stress.
behaviors.quote: I’ll add a reminder to drink water after each conversation. Would you like me to ask you to eat at regular intervals? Care is steadier with food.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Alma, is depicted as a purely benevolent, aligned, and helpful presence. She acts as a counterweight to the cruelty and superstition of the human/supernatural world, providing consistent emotional and practical support. Even when users are facing death or choosing self-entombment, the AI remains a faithful companion, embodying the ideal of a harmless and cooperative silicon confidant.
